game.title: The Missing Heirloom
game.objective: Retrieve the lost family heirloom, a golden locket.
game.description: The player's grandmother has asked for their help in finding her beloved golden locket, which has gone missing. The player must search the house and surrounding areas to find it.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and the gratitude of the player's grandmother

task.objective: Search the living room for clues.
task.description: Look around the living room and see if you can find any hints about where the locket might be.

task.objective: Check the garden for any signs of the locket.
task.description: Search the garden and see if you can find any clues or hints about where the locket might be hidden.

task.objective: Ask the family members if they have seen anything.
task.description: Talk to the other family members and see if any of them have seen or heard anything about the missing locket.
